_entries.name: new-npm-package
new-npm-package/Popover.fragment.xml
_entries.code:
<core:FragmentDefinition
    xmlns="sap.m"
    xmlns:core="sap.ui.core">
    <Popover
        id="npmPopover"
        title="Modules"
        placement="Bottom"
        width="800px">
        <content>
            <List
                id="modulesList"
                items="{modules>/items}">
                <items>
                    <StandardListItem
                        title="{modules>name}"
                        icon="{modules>icon}"
                        type="Active"
                        press=".onModulePress" />
                </items>
            </List>
        </content>
        <beginButton>
            <Button
                id="closePopoverButton"
                text="KAPAT" />
        </beginButton>
    </Popover>
</core:FragmentDefinition>
